query:
UPDATE news SET slug = CONCAT('news-', id) WHERE slug = '';
ALTER TABLE news ADD UNIQUE INDEX idx_news_slug (slug);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ymh12nCSeHu8Na.root --database nb9WvzpHUTfcigQwoxqRAZ --execute UPDATE news SET slug = CONCAT('news-', id) WHERE slug = '';
ALTER TABLE news ADD UNIQUE INDEX idx_news_slug (slug);
